Volunteer
positions

Join our volunteer program!

We have several projects waiting for your skills! If you're interested please reach out to us with a short description of your skill level and why you would like to volunteer you time.


Positions

  • Technical Consultant, SuperLooper

    SuperLooper is a subscription service which operates as a lending library for maternity and baby garments. Continue reading

  • Wordpress developer, Ethical.net

    Ethical.net is a not-for-profit project building a free and open platform for discovering ethical alternatives to stuff. Continue reading

  • Data Scientist, Ethical.net

    Ethical.net is a not-for-profit project building a free and open platform for discovering ethical alternatives to stuff. Continue reading

  • Wordpress developer & SEO expert, Transpire

    Transpire is building a community around Transhumanism and Planet Preservation. Continue reading

  • Animator, VideoWiki

    VideoWiki aims to make Wikipedia more accessible to people with low literacy. Continue reading
